about_the_game:
Get the Premium Pass and unleash an additional 80 unlockable items in Monster Racing League's Race Pass. Stand out with premium cosmetics and unlock monsters with powerful abilities and boosters faster!

The Premium Pass includes:
  • 4 premium monsters
  • 4 premium cars
  • 8 premium helmets
  • 8 premium armour sets
  • 14 premium face adornments
  • 8 premium colourways
  • and over 30 other unlockable items
